task.title: Refunds
task.shortdesc: Refunds are compensations paid to the customer for over invoiceing or returning goods and/or services.

context.p: To refund a customer on a Phone or Tablet:

step.cmd: Tap the three horizontal bar lines on your interface to access the menu bar.
Then, tap "Transactions" in the menu bar to access the Customer Transactions page.
Next, find the customer transaction that you want to refund. The Transactions page lists the custoner orders in order and you can also search by receipt or card number.
Tap the button "Isuue Refund" to access refud page.
Square users are able to issue a refiind by "Items" or "Amount."

substep.cmd: To issue receipt by "Items," select the refund option of your customer's preffermece. Then, tap the "Next" button to precced with the refund
To issue a refund by "Amount," type the specific amount on your screen. Then , tap the "Next" button to prpcees with the refund.

step.cmd: After reviewing refund information, Square users have the option to add a gift card.
Then select the reason for refund and tap the button "Refund".
When refund is completed, tap the button "Done" to finish proccess.
